        Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation(2007). Length : 100min         


 A gun-for-hire "Hitman" is a genetically-engineered, elite assassin known    
 only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as &#039;The Agency&#039; is ensnared in  
 a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued                              
 by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Eastern         
 Europe. But even 47 couldn&#039;t anticipate a "random equation" in his life      
 exactitude: the unexpected stirrings of his conscience and the unfamiliar    
 emotions aroused in him by a mysterious Russian woman.
